field.name: focusoff_border
field.descr:
Inner border around the list when the list does not have input focus
Note that if the list has column_borders, they connect to the input focus frame, so this should be visible. The default is "listfocusoff_border", which is empty, no border drawn around the list when it has no focus. This border is the same size as "listfocuson_border". Use visible_focusoff_border() to install the default theme focusoff border.

field.name: focuson_border
field.descr:
Inner border around the list when the list has input focus
Border should be the same size as the focusoff_border

field.name: v_padding
field.descr: Padding above and below each list item

field.name: h_padding
field.descr: Default padding before and after each list item.

field.name: indent
field.descr: When using hierarchical indentations, indentation increment.

field.name: selected_color
field.descr:
Selected color
Used only by a \c INSERT_LIBX_NAMESPACE::w::highlighted_list.

field.name: highlighted_color
field.descr:
Highlighted color
Item's color when the pointer button #1 is pressed on top of it.

field.name: current_color
field.descr:
Currently selected color
Item's color when the pointer is hovering on top of it, without the button being pressed.

field.name: unmarked_icon
field.descr:
Unmarked list icon
In a bulleted list, the icon next to an unmarked item. This should be a transparent image that's the same size as the marked icon

field.name: marked_icon
field.descr:
Marked list icon
Indicates that the item is selected, in a bulleted list.

field.name: submenu_icon
field.descr:
Submenu indication icon
Indicates that the menu item opens a submenu

field.name: contents_appearance
field.descr:
List contents appearance
The label_font and label_color control the default font and color of the items in the list. Coincidentally, in combo-boxes this also controls the popup window's appearance.
